title: How can I update the mobile number linked to my #MySaveUp by BPI account?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [Can I open a #MySaveUp by BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30335443503385-Can-I-open-a-MySaveUp-by-BPI-account)
- [What is the interest rate in #MySaveUp by BPI?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30242240950809-What-is-the-interest-rate-in-MySaveUp-by-BPI)
- [How can I make a deposit to my #MySaveUp by BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/5134504808473-How-can-I-make-a-deposit-to-my-MySaveUp-by-BPI-account)
- [How can I withdraw from my #MySaveUp by BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30242279662233-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-MySaveUp-by-BPI-account)
- [How can I update the mobile number linked to my #MySaveUp by BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/5846368238873-How-can-I-update-the-mobile-number-linked-to-my-MySaveUp-by-BPI-account)
- [How can I close my #MySaveUp by BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30242463562905-How-can-I-close-my-MySaveUp-by-BPI-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To change the mobile number linked to your #MySaveUp by BPI account, you must first change the mobile number registered to your GCash account. [Click here](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9059222758041-I-want-to-update-my-mobile-number-registered-to-my-GCash-Account) to learn how.

Once youâ€™ve completed the process, the mobile number linked to your #MySaveUp by BPI account will also be updated within **14 business days**.

Make sure your new number is [fully verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC) then [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gsave__i_want_to_change_my_mobile_number_in_gsave.) A customer service representative will contact you in **1-2 business days.**
